executive_summary: The Adult Stores industry has grown even as escalating external competition from online and mainstream adult product retailers have pressured growth. The widespread acceptance of sex paraphernalia and increased sexuality on TV have helped boost demand for industry stores. While mandated store closures caused by the COVID-19 pandemic temporarily shifted demand to online channels, industry revenue bounced back as consumers looked to the industry in light of restrictions on many forms of entertainment.
